topic.title: Topic
topic.description: Refers to an UTF-8 string that the broker uses to filter messages for each connected client. The topic consists of one or more topic levels. Each topic level is separated by a forward slash (topic level separator).

reconnectAttempts.title: Reconnect attempts
reconnectAttempts.description: Number of reconnect attempts after any kind of disconnection.

enabled.title: Enable the consumer capability
enabled.description: Allow enabling or disabling the consumer capability.

enabled.title: Enable the producer capability
enabled.description: Allow enabling or disabling the producer capability.

retained.title: Retain flag
retained.description: Define if the retain flag must be set to every publish messages. The broker stores the last retained message.

responseTopic.title: Response topic
responseTopic.description: The response topic represents the topics on which the responses from the receivers of the message are expected.
